GET /api.description: delivers a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: delivers an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: delivers an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: delivers an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: delivers an array of all comments associated with an article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Allows a client to upvote or downvote for an article, and responds with that article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Allows a user to post a comment associated with an article, and responds with that comment

users.body: I hate streaming eyes even more
users.author: icellusedkars

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Allows a user to delete a comment and responds with empty content
